H0.text: Who was the only British Prime Minister to hold office during the reign of King Edward VIII. Neville Chamberlain

H1.text: Who was the only British Prime Minister to hold office during the reign of King Edward VIII. Ramsay MacDonald

H2.text: Who was the only British Prime Minister to hold office during the reign of King Edward VIII. Winston Churchill

H3.text: Who was the only British Prime Minister to hold office during the reign of King Edward VIII. Stanley Baldwin

A4.text: Baldwin would have had to resign, and no other party leader would have served as the prime minister under the King

A5.text: Baldwin has been widely praised for forcing and expediting the abdication of Edward VIII
